          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ploščine geometrijskih likov - križanka</string>
            <string language="en">Areas of geometric shapes - crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereiche der geometrischen Formen - 
Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Zones des formes géométriques - mots croisé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Áreas de formas geométricas - crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zone delle figure geometriche - parole 
incrociate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τομείς των γεωμετρικών μορφών - σταυρόλεξο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Áreas de las dimensiones de una variable 
geométricas - crucigrama</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Križanka sestavljena iz besed povezanih z ploščino geometrijskih likov.</string>
            <string language="en">Crossword puzzle build of terms related to the areas of different geometric shapes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">matematika</string>
            <string language="en">mathematics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ploščina</string>
            <string language="en">area</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lik</string>
            <string language="en">shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">geometrija</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtselbau von Bezeichnungen stand auf 
den Bereichen der unterschiedlichen geometrischen Formen in 
Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La construction de jeu de mots croisé des 
limites a associé aux zones de différentes formes géométriques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A configuração do enigma de crossword dos 
termos relacionou-se às áreas de formas geométricas diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La configurazione di cruciverba dei termini si è
riferita alle zone delle figure geometriche differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατασκευή γρίφων σταυρόλεξων των όρων αφορούσε τους
τομείς των διαφορετικών γεωμετρικών μορφών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura del crucigrama de términos se 
relacionó con las áreas de diversas dimensiones de una variable 
geométricas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
